description: Retrieves the adjustment rate that converts CB stock area into local warehouse price for a specific shop

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, used to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours

parameters.name: merchant_id
parameters.description: Shopper's unique identifier for a merchant. Required for all merchant level requests(CB ONDC use selling global product related APIs)

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated to identify your permission by combining access_token, merchant_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the shop whose adjustment rate is being queried

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if an error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if an error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: warning
response_fields.description: Indicate waring details if hit waring. Empty if no waring happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

children.name: local_adjustment_rate
children.description: The multiplier used to adjust the cross-border original price to local price
